import React, { useContext } from 'react' import "./category_products.css" import { Link, useNavigate} from "react-router-dom" import { cartContext } from './contexts/cartContexts' const CategoryProducts = ({id, title, features, specs,price}) => { console.log(id) const navigate = useNavigate() const cartContext = useContext(CartContext) return (

{title}

Dimensions

{specs.dimensions}

Features

{/*
    {featureList()}
*/}

£{price}

) } export default CategoryProducts
